title: Virtual World-Based HRD Competency Enhancement Training: Performance Evaluation Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Role-play-centered learning for practitioners using smartphone-based virtual world platforms.

learning_goals: Learners can perform various roles (supervisor/peer/subordinate) in a virtual environment and replicate the performance evaluation process with 80% accuracy.
Learners improve their feedback integration skills by 70% through three simulated assessment simulations.
Learners can compare and explain differences in performance evaluation strategies across organizational cultures in four or more ways through team-based PBL assignments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
